name: check_content_publication_status
description:
Get the publishing status of a TikTok video or photo post.

This endpoint allows you to check the current status of a post publishing task,
including whether it has completed successfully or is still in progress.

user_session_token.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators.

company_account_id.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account.

submission_identifier.description: Unique identifier for a post publishing task.

name: retrieve_account_analytics
description: Get profile data of a TikTok account, including analytics and insights.

authorization_credential.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators.

profile_identifier.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account.

analytics_start_date.description: Query start date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to None.

analytics_end_date.description: Query end date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to None.

requested_data_points.description:
List of requested fields to include in the response. Defaults to None.
- username
- display_name
- profile
- analytics
- settings

name: upload_video_to_account
description:
Publish a public video post to a TikTok account.

This endpoint allows you to upload and publish a video to your TikTok account with various
customization options for the post's visibility and interaction settings.

api_access_key.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators.

user_business_handle.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account.

source_video_uri.description: URL of the video to be published.

tags.description: List of tags for the video.

thumbnail_url.description: URL of the thumbnail for the video.

thumbnail_offset.description: Time offset in seconds for video thumbnail.

video_description.description: Caption text for the video. Defaults to None.

set_as_organic_brand_content.description: Whether the post is organic branded content. Defaults to False.

designate_as_branded_post.description: Whether the post is branded content. Defaults to False.

block_user_comments.description: Whether to disable comments. Defaults to False.

restrict_duet_creation.description: Whether to disable duet feature. Defaults to False.

prevent_video_stitching.description: Whether to disable stitch feature. Defaults to False.

thumbnail_start_time.description: Time offset in seconds for video thumbnail. Defaults to 0.

flag_as_ai_created.description: Whether the content is AI-generated. Defaults to False.

save_post_as_draft.description: Whether to save as draft instead of publishing. Defaults to False.
